text: Ikenwoli Godfrey Emiko (19 March 1955 â€“ 21 December 2020) was a Nigerian businessman, philanthropist and traditional ruler. He was the Olu of Warri from 2015 until his death. He was crowned Ogiame Ikenwoli on 12 December 2015 Emiko died on 21 December 2020 in Warri, Nigeria from COVID-19 at the age of 65.Olu of Warri Ikenwoli Godfrey Emiko dies of COVID-19 ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nigerian businesspeople Category:African philanthropists Category:Nigerian philanthropists Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Nigeria
title: Ikenwoli Godfrey Emiko
